name: Car Driving Vegas City
description:
Car Driving Vegas City is the real feeling as the life, so vegas furiou drift is not only the game, but also the true of life. It is easy to control your car, but hard to be a top driver.
Features:
1. Vegas city themed speed racing
2. Fast furious car drive feeling
3. Fight to the racer with your driving skill
4. Real city scene, mad drift
